headline: Sheffield United Women sign defender Abbie Lafayette
summary: Sheffield United have signed 22-year-old attacking full-back Abbie Lafayette from former Championship side Watford. She had joined the Hornets last summer after a successful spell with Ipswich Town, earning a move up to the Barclays […]

headline: Spain remain holders of all women’s youth titles with late winner
summary: Spain made it a hat-trick of UEFA Women’s U-19 European Championship titles with a 2-1 extra-time defeat of the Netherlands in Lithuania. They were ahead after only six minutes, as Player of the Tournament Daniela […]

headline: Portsmouth Women sign Ireland international Erin McLaughlin
summary: Portsmouth have signed Republic of Ireland international midfielder Erin McLaughlin on a one-year contract with the option of an additional 12 months. The 21-year-old joins from FAI WNL side Peamount United, with whom she made […]

headline: St James Swifts go top after seeing off Belfast Celtic comeback
summary: St James Swifts knocked non-playing leaders Sion Swifts off the top of the NIWFA Championship with a 3-2 defeat of Belfast Celtic. But it did take a last-minute Chloe Doak strike to secure the points […]

headline: Manchester United win Girls’ Premier SuperCupNI
summary: Friday was finals day at SuperCupNI and Manchester United edged Northern Ireland 2-1 in the Premier Girls’ Cup. Northern Ireland won all their group games in qualifying for the final but it was Group A […]

headline: Everton Women sign Greece international Veatriki Sarri
summary: Everton sign 26-year-old Greece international midfielder Veatriki Sarri following her two seasons at Brighton.  Listing Sheffield United and Birmingham City among her former clubs, Sarri made 53 appearances for Albion and scored six goals. Sarri […]

headline: Sunderland Women sign Keira Flannery on loan from West Ham
summary: Sunderland have signed 18-year-old midfielder Keira Flannery on a season-long loan from West Ham United. Capped by England up to U-19 level so far, Flannery made her West Ham first-team debut in 2022 against Chelsea. […]

headline: Women’s pre-season friendlies fixture list for 27/28 July
summary: Pre-season friendlies this weekend include AFC Bournemouth against Ipswich Town, Derby home to Middlesbrough and Sunderland taking on Rangers. With pre-season games sometimes subject to changes, it is always advisable to check clubs’ social media […]

headline: Mayra Ramirez red card ends Colombia Women’s fightback
summary: The Paris Olympics got underway with Canada and Spain coming from behind to win but Colombia’s fightback against France fell just short after a red card. France made a strong start against Colombia, three up […]

headline: Barclays WSL & Championship Summer 2024 Transfer Watch
summary: Keep track of all the 2024 summer transfer window moves involving Barclays WSL and Women’s Championship players with our regularly updated list. Although the WSL transfer window remains open from 24 June through to 13 […]
